definition: -ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Di4 qiu2 Wu4 li3 Xue2 hui4

definition: Around the World in Eighty Days by Jules Verne 儒勒·凡爾納|儒勒·凡尔纳[Ru2 le4 · Fan2 er3 na4]
pinyin: Ba1 shi2 Tian1 Huan2 you2 Di4 qiu2

definition: clash that leaves both sides shattered

sentences.english: We all know that the earth is a sphere.
sentences.chinese: 我們都知道地球是一個球體。

sentences.english: Feel how you are coming into s state of Balance with the Earth.
sentences.chinese: 感受你現在進入到一種與地球完全合一的全然狀態。

sentences.english: Metsamor lies on some of Earth's most earthquake-prone terrain.
sentences.chinese: Metsamor核電站位於地球上地震多發的地帶。

sentences.english: Ark Angel now entering Earth orbit.
sentences.chinese: “方舟天使”號現在進入地球軌道。

sentences.english: As time gose by, man is making the earth sike .
sentences.chinese: 隨着時間的推移，人類正在令地球受到破壞。

sentences.english: The sun is a huge blazing ball, a million times larger than the earth.
sentences.chinese: 太陽是個龐大的熾燃火球，比地球大一百多萬倍。

sentences.english: The earth was as completely cloud-shrouded as normally is the planet Venus.
sentences.chinese: 整個地球就像金星平時那樣完全被雲霧掩蓋着。

sentences.english: First off, allow us to apologize for the abductions.
sentences.chinese: 首先，請容許咱們爲綁票地球人而表達歉意。

sentences.english: One is a spectrometer that measures sunlight reflected from the Earth's surface.
sentences.chinese: 一個是光譜儀，它測量從地球表面反射的陽光。

sentences.english: Antarctica is one of the last real wildernesses left on the earth.
sentences.chinese: 南極洲是地球上所剩不多的曠野之一。

sentences.english: The earth is an oblate sphere .
The habitability of Earth depends on a lot more than just orbit location and its mass.
sentences.chinese: 地球的可居住性不僅僅取決於它的位置和雲層。

sentences.english: We’ve all heard about the Earth’s temperature rising at an alarming rate.
sentences.chinese: 我們都聽說了地球的溫度在以令人擔憂的速度上升。

sentences.english: Some government officials speuak in favour of the company that destroyed the earth.
sentences.chinese: 有些政府官員爲那家破壞地球的公司幫腔。

sentences.english: The earth and the sun are two great sources of life.
sentences.chinese: 地球與太陽是生命的兩大源泉。

sentences.english: Back on Earth, in a wordless montage, Batman goes to see Vixen.
sentences.chinese: 無聲的蒙太奇鏡頭閃回了地球，蝙蝠俠去看維克森。

definition: celestial body (e.g. planet, satellite etc)/heavenly body
Titan (moon of Saturn), aka Saturn VI
